overview: The film will chronicle Warne’s life as the first woman to become a detective for the famous Pinkerton National Detective Agency. Little is known about her life prior to joining the agency at twenty-three, but the project is described as a “propulsive action adventure” surrounding her time as the world’s first female Sherlock Holmes, paving a bright future for women in law enforcement.
title: Untitled Female Pinkerton Agent Film
